name: GLKTextureInfo
desc: Information about OpenGL textures created by the GLKTextureLoader class.

items.name: var name: GLuint
items.desc: The OpenGL context’s name for the texture.

items.name: var target: GLenum
items.desc: The OpenGL binding target for the texture.

items.name: var height: GLuint
items.desc: The height of the loaded texture.

items.name: var width: GLuint
items.desc: The width of the loaded texture.

items.name: var textureOrigin: GLKTextureInfoOrigin
items.desc: The location of the origin in the loaded texture.

items.name: var alphaState: GLKTextureInfoAlphaState
items.desc: The state of the alpha component in the loaded texture.

items.name: var containsMipmaps: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that states whether the loaded texture contains mip maps.

items.name: enum GLKTextureInfoAlphaState
items.desc: Values that describe the alpha information stored in a source image’s pixel data.

items.name: enum GLKTextureInfoOrigin
items.desc: The location of the origin in the original source image.
